body: "The earthquake did not kill people. Bad buildings killed people. Lack of medical care killed people. Lack of infrastructure killed people. Lack of caring government officials kill[s] people": Dying in Haiti is convinced that "most Haitian suffering is not necessary and is preventable in the first place."
original_body: "The earthquake did not kill people. Bad buildings killed people. Lack of medical care killed people. Lack of infrastructure killed people. Lack of caring government officials kill[s] people": Dying in Haiti is convinced that "most Haitian suffering is not necessary and is preventable in the first place."
title: Haiti: Preventable Suffering
